channel.title: Help with Zenith
channel.description:
Hi all,
I need help with Zenith Source and Client, i play with my friends, i host from my VPS and i play with my friends but only three players can play, when others try to log in it shows: Login limit exceeded: too many connections from your address! What can it be, how can i raise the limit ?

item.title: Help with Zenith
item.dc:creator: @eri0nn eri0nn
item.description:
@eri0nn wrote:

Hi all,

I need help with Zenith Source and Client, i play with my friends, i host from my VPS and i play with my friends but only three players can play, when others try to log in it shows: Login limit exceeded: too many connections from your address! What can it be, how can i raise the limit ?
